thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Premier Louvre Saint Honore - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Moneay Stolen
thread.title_full: Moneay Stolen - Review of BEST WESTERN Premier Louvre Saint Honore, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: hari b
title: Moneay Stolen
text: Reading about stolen money in a recent review, we sadly recalled our own experience when 1,000 pound sterling were stolen from our hand bag in this terrible hotel -the worst in our life-time of travel. When we complained to Best Western, they said the same thing, namely that they are not responsible for it. Best Western should take this hotel off their list and Paris Police should look into the scandal of money being stolen at this hotel. In our case it was most certainly the taxi driver whom the hotel asked to help us in taking our luggage to the room as the hotel has no concierge/porters.
